DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine effect ingest mouth rinse sucrose ( carbohydrate ) versus sucralose ( carbohydrate-free ) drink self control , cognitive performance , blood glucose level .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Ingesting Rinsing Sucrose Sucralose Self-control , Cognitive Performance , Blood Glucose
DOC.criteria: BMI 18 29 kg/m2 Dementia Depression Type 2 diabetes Phenylketonuria Intake medication know affect glucose metabolism Fasting blood glucose > 7.8 mmol/L
